title: Calories in Starbucks Classic Syrup
meta_description: Learn calories in classic syrup starbucks per pump, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs and sugars for customizing your drinks.
assumptions: Per standard Starbucks pump (approx. 7.5 ml or 1/4 oz); simple syrup made from sugar and water.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact formulation, dispenser calibration, and any additives; check Starbucks app or labels for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One pump of Starbucks classic syrup contains 20 calories, primarily from 5 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add to a grande latte (4 pumps total)

faqs.q: How many calories in one pump of classic syrup starbucks?
What are the carbs in classic syrup starbucks?
faqs.a: 5 g carbs per pump, all from sugars with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does classic syrup starbucks have fat or protein?
faqs.a: 0 g fat and 0 g protein per pump.

faqs.q: How many pumps in a typical Starbucks drink?
faqs.a: Varies: 2 for tall, 3 for grande, 4 for venti iced drinks.

faqs.q: Calories in classic syrup starbucks vs. flavored syrups?
faqs.a: Similar at ~20 kcal per pump; flavored may add negligible extras.
